metadata.description: Deployment prefix. E.g. Organization-DeploymentType
WorkspaceId or CustomerId value of OMS. This value is referenced in OMS VM Extension
WorkspaceKey value of OMS. This value is referenced in OMS VM Extension
Default storage account Key. Storage account that contains output parameters and common scripts

Azure Active Directory Thumbprint

Jumpbox AKV encryption key

Jumpbox ASG Name
Name of Shared Services Subnet, this name is used to get the SubnetId
Name of the extension deployment.
The username used to establish jumpbox VMs.
The password given to the admin user.
Number of jumpbox VMs to be created.
Size of the jumpbox VMs.
OS platform of the jumpbox VM image.
OS image used for the jumpbox VMs.

OS image used for the jumpbox VMs.
Indicates whether or not to encrypt the VM disks
